name: Stripped of Title: Backlash — Episode 1
description:
Stripped of Title: Backlash is a 3d adventure in the "walking simulator" genre featuring modern graphics, deep story and plenty of adult content.


  • Plenty of quests with branching dialogues and carefully crafted cutscenes to enhance the story.
  • A wide range of fully animated uncensored sex scenes.
  • Modern 3d graphics powered by Unreal Engine. Using the engine's high-end rendering we are able to make our girls look better then ever!
  • Highly detailed environments featuring several biomes.
